paper_abstract: A fundamental theorem of Buchi and Landweber shows that the Church synthesis problem is computable. Buchi and Landweber reduced the Church Problem to problems about omega-games and used the determinacy of such games as one of the main tools to show its computability. We consider a natural generalization of the Church problem to countable ordinals and investigate games of arbitrary countable length. We prove that determinacy and decidability parts of the Buchi and Landweber theorem hold for all countable ordinals and that its full extension holds for all ordinals < omega(omega).
paper_title: THE CHURCH PROBLEM FOR COUNTABLE ORDINALS
